title: Ray Rice Seeks NFL Reinstatement
teaser: Sports analyst Mike Pesca talks about Rice's appeal after being suspended from the NFL in September for hitting his then-fiance.
contentencoded:
Former NFL player Ray Rice and his wife are testifying Thursday before a former U.S. District Court judge, who is hearing Rice’s appeal on the suspension the league put into action in September.

The NFL suspended Rice after a video surfaced of the former running back of the Baltimore Ravens, hitting Janay Palmer, who was then his fiance, in an elevator at an Atlantic City casino.

Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca joins host Robin Young with the latest.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
